message: I was shocked when I found out that NBC had written about Snack&Munch only after 1 week we launched!  Read the story and please try out my service :-) http://www.nbcwashington.com/the-scene/food-drink/Online-Vending-Machine-119185494.html  promo code: 2BUCKS
@ammar How do you get there? You had got previous contacts with NBC or Mashable, right? Or if you have a secret sauce, please tell me :D
@justinschultz thanks!  Last night we got onto Mashable!!!! http://mashable.com/2011/04/05/snackandmunch/
@ccarnino  no contact just a lot of praying :-)
Really, you didn't had any kind of contact with them?
WTF! How can it be? Ok, I've stopped to pray long time ago, but I think that this has not influenced the coverage of our startup :P
@ccarnino really no contact at all.  one thing my brother did was write a press release and then sent to random reporters he found via HARO (helpareporterout.com)
@ammar tnx for the link. I'll try to write to HARO too. Obviously it will not help us surely, but
@ccarnino We were featured in the Microsoft BizSpark section on Mashable, we applied for it here: http://mashable.com/bizspark/
But you have to use Microsoft products or there aren't limitations?
I guess not. After all they are using rails :P
